inclusion.criterion: cooperate with nasal irrigation, scoring and informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: cerebrospinal fluid rhinorrhea during and after surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: sphenoid sinusitis before transsphenoidal pituitary tumor resection
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He has incomplete clinical data for cerebrospinal fluid rhinorrhea during and after surgery.
